text: Kanneda is an Indian Hindi-language crime drama television series directed by Chandan Arora, who is known for his work in Indian films and television. The show tells a strong and emotional story about crime, justice and the challenges faced by people in difficult situations. ==Overview== Produced under JAR Pictures, it stars Parmish Verma, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub, Ranvir Shorey, Arunoday Singh, Aadar Malik and Jasmin Bajwa. The series is scheduled to premiere on 21 March 2025 on JioHotstar. ==Cast== * Parmish Verma as Nirmal Chahal * Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub * Ranvir Shorey * Arunoday Singh * Aadar Malik * Jasmin Bajwa as Harleen ==Production== Principal photography of the series reportedly began in 2023. The trailer of the series was released on 26 February 2025. ==Music== The music for Kanneda is composed by Parmish Verma. ==Release== The series was made available to stream on JioHotstar on 21 March 2025. == Reception == Devesh Sharma of Filmfare gave three and a half stars out of five. Kanneda received 4 out of 5 stars from Vineeta Kumar of India Today. ==Other websites== * * Kanneda on JioHotstar ==References== Category:Indian television series Category:2020s television series debuts Category:2020s drama television series
title: Kanneda
